title: Satisfaction from sex toys not a bad idea — Ex Big Brother housemate, Ese Eriata

organizations.name: ese eriata breaking news translate home

text:
Breaking News Translate Home » Entertainment » Satisfaction from sex toys not a bad idea — Ex Big Brother housemate, Ese Eriata Satisfaction from sex toys not a bad idea — Ex Big Brother housemate, Ese Eriata On 2:34 am In Entertainment by Nwafor Polycarp Comments 
BY ROTIMI AGBANA 
No doubt, evicted fake Big Brother Naija housemate, Ese Eriata, has big ideas about love, romance, and sexual satisfaction. Little wonder Big Brother specially hand-picked her alongside fake housemate, Jon, to storm the Big Brother house with the major task of putting the real housemates on their toes to bring their A-game to play in the reality TV show currently taking place in South Africa. 
In a recent chat with Potpourri, the model turned singer, who recently released her debut single, Super Love, expressed her opinion about the use of sex toys to derive sexual satisfaction. To her, there is nothing wrong if a woman satisfies her libido with a sex toy, but she should make sure her man is in the know. 
“To me, I don’t think it’s a bad idea having a sex toy because it would reduce the level of cheating in relationships, but whenever you use sex toys, you should always tell your man about it. I don’t think there is anything wrong for a lady having a sex toys”, the sensual singer, who recently returned to Nigeria after fulfilling her mission in the Big Brother house, believes that sex toys could help in the drastic reduction of crisis in relationships. Nwafor Polycarp
